Text: Some dickhead has seen fit to leave a transparent tag on this episode #DarkestBeforeDawn? What a bunch of wanders, now I have to download another clean copy. Why oh Why....
@fengels - That happens to be how it was broadcast.

Many thanks to the duchebag who left the transparent tag on the video! That is sooo clever, and also, sooo useful... There is absolutely NO REASON to download a 1Go-video with high definition image and multi channels audio, to eventually get an I'm-gonna-screw-your-sight-for-the-whole-episode-transparent-tag. What a waste of time...
hmmm, so, am I the duchebag who did not understand that the hash tag came with the original tv stream? :):) oh well.... :) I still think that's stupid... :)
